== Iriveri (CT) (627243) ==

Iriveri (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 11.77 sq. km. and harbouring 3564 households with total population of 17231 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 15 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 525 km. Male population is 7873 and female population is 9358. Scheduled Caste population is 229 and Scheduled Tribes population is 25. Census Location Code of the town is 627243<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 75 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 104 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 15 km.
